Using the eRnsT Viewer > Setting Properties > 

Properties for Light Sources

 
 
 

When you select a light source in your scene, the Object Properties tab in the properties pane to the right of the 3D view automatically displays all configuration settings available for that kind of light source.

All light sources share a basic set of common properties, such as the color and intensity of their light. Most also have their own specific settings. For details on the settings offered by each type of light source, see the sub-topics under this page.
